channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous dip in road surface on corner j11a southbound exit sliproad, 19th April
item.description:
There is a dangerous dip in the exit slip road that’s been getting worse over the last 3 years. Today it caused my car to bottom out and swerve across the lane. If it was vusier this would have caused an accident resulting in serious injury and possibly death.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree needs replacing, 19th April
item.description:
Tree died many years ago and was removed. A replacement is required, previously reported as 2 trees needed replacing one either side of the Avenue , 1 was done but this one wasn't. No idea why it wasn't done when the other one was.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Jersey Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree, 19th April
item.description:
The tree on the right hand side of the Avenue as you head down the Avenue has died. It needs to be removed and a new one planted. Previously reported.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 122 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken public bicycle pump, 18th April
item.description:
The public bicycle pump on Cheltenham High Street near John Lewis has broken or been vandalised. The lever that locks the pump outlet onto the tyre valve has broken off, just visible in photo. Please could you arrange for this to be fixed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 143 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking lines very worn and faded, 17th April
item.description:
Along both sides of granville the car parking lines are very faded and hard to see, the whole road needs a resurface as many potholes and the road is stoney due to it crumbling. Swindon street just parrell has been resurfaced and new parking bay lines have been drawn which is needed in granville.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Granville Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large cones in the road covering what looked like potholes, 16th April
item.description:
We drove past and the cones and holes where enough into the road that we had to cross into the other lane to get past it, but the obstructions were at corners of the road so they appeared suddenly and made us overtake in a blind zone - seems dangerous!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car park is missing signage, 15th April
item.description:
Car park is missing legally required signage at the entrance for parking changes to be enforceable as per British Car Park Association requirements Car park should also have regular ‘pay at machine’ signs per the Highway Code. Signage was previously displayed as can be seen on Google street view but has been removed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Old Coach House Chandos Street, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Shurdington Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Potholes / Sinking Road, 14th April
item.description:
Where the builders who are laying pipes / cables have bodged the refilling of the trenches they are collapsing and causing massive holes. This is currently in the centre of the roadworks / traffic lights. Please get them to fix it ASAP it's dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Irish Butts Stoke Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
